subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Australian mare Black Caviar won the 25th consecutive race of her career, breaking out of a tight pack about 546 yards  from the finish to win the T. J. Smith Stakes by two lengths.
snippet: The Australian mare Black Caviar won the 25th consecutive race of her career, breaking out of a tight pack about 546 yards  from the finish to win the T. J. Smith Stakes by two lengths.
